verbs.description: [ARG0: White House Press Secretary Sarah Sanders] [V: argued] [ARG1: with reporters] [ARGM-TMP: during a heated press briefing on Thursday] [ARGM-TMP: after being questioned about the Trump administration 's decision to separate immigrant children from their parents] .

White House Press Secretary Sarah Sanders argued with reporters during a heated press briefing on Thursday after [V: being] questioned about the Trump administration 's decision to separate immigrant children from their parents .

[ARG2: White House Press Secretary Sarah Sanders] argued with reporters during a heated press briefing on Thursday after being [V: questioned] [ARG1: about the Trump administration 's decision to separate immigrant children from their parents] .
